title: T-206 Style Tolstoi Cigarette Pack Shell
author: canjond

posts.post_title: T-206 Style Tolstoi Cigarette Pack Shell
posts.post_content:
I have available for sale the outer shell of a Tolstoi cigarette box (the inner slide is missing).  Still displays great, and much cheaper than a complete pack.

 $175 shipped.
Super old post but do you still have this ?
Unfortunately it sold a long while ago. I do have some extra T-206 era cigarette packs, however, if interested. I can send you a list.
Are you saying you have tolstoi packs or other brands? I only collect tolstoi. If you have any would love to see em w price.

[quote name="canjond" post=1855501]Unfortunately it sold a long while ago. I do have some extra T-206 era cigarette packs, however, if interested. I can send you a list.[/QUOTE]
Pm sent
Unfortunately no Tolstoi pack available.  I have a few T206/T205 era ones like an Old Mill, Honest Long Cut, Polar Bear and Sovereign.
